message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $180?
I understand that $250 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $220, which is a great deal considering the value this product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $220 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $200?
I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think $200 is getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I can do $210, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $190?
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, but I'm still not willing to go below $205. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum acceptable price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $195?
